mapper.select: select date, sum(price*qnt) as totalPurchase, type from trade_view where type='1' group by date
select date, sum(price*qnt) as totalSale, type from trade_view where type='2' group by date
select warehouse_name, Sum(price*qnt) as totalSale from trade_view where type='2' group by warehouse_name

select item, item_name, date, sum(case when type='1' then price*qnt else 0 end) as totalPurchase, sum(case when type='2' then price*qnt else 0 end) as totalSale, sum(case when type='2' then price*qnt else 0 end) - sum(case when type='1' then price*qnt else 0 end) as profit from trade_view group by date, item

select i.sales_items_id as item, i.sales_qnt as qnt, i.sales_price as price, (i.sales_qnt * i.sales_price) as sale, s.sales_location as location, s.sales_date as date from erp_sales s, erp_sales_info i where i.sales_id = s.sales_id group by s.sales_location as location
select account_total as total, account_regdate as date from erp_account
